title: Men's Casual Shorts 7" Lightweight Golf Shorts for Men Stretch with 3 Pockets Quick Dry Breathable Work Shorts
description: Material: Lightweight & AIRY fabric provides all-day comfort. Moisture wicking technology pulls sweat away from your skin for comfort throughout your daily life.
7'' inseam: Above the knee, provides better ventilation and heat dissipation. Made from multi-directional stretch fabric that moves freely and comfortably with you.
3 Pockets Design: 1 side deep zipper pocket provide safe storage for your mobile phone, keys, cash, etc. 2 Front slash pockets for easy access to your items.
Expandable Waistband: Better fit and comfort without the discomfort of overly tight or loose belts. Zip fly and button closure provide a secure fit.
Occation: Suitable for daily casual wear, golf, work and business casual. Remaining comfortable and decent in a variety of settings adds a sense of ease and coziness to our lives.
